title: Does the construction of the border wall threaten the burial sites of Native Americans?
subtitle: According to the Republic of Arizona Raúl Gregalva, there were explosions in the memorial hill, where he is setting up a burial site for the Tohono Odham nation.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The controlled explosion was used near the original American burial sites during the construction of a border wall between the United States and Mexico at the National Memorial of Organic Pipelines in Arizona.
